message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Your share is decreasing faster than mine, Alice. How about a 55/45 split now?
I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage, but your offer was too low. Let's meet in the middle.
This is getting us nowhere Alice. An even split is the fairest option. Take it or leave it.
Bob, time is running out. An even split won't work because of the inflation. I need a little extra to make it fair.
